text: To Senior DevOps Engineers, perm or contractors looking for some security, who want a new and exciting opportunity within a sports and data streaming organisation, 3d immersive visualisation and gamification of sporting events is the plan. Tech stack - AWS/GCP, Docker, Jenkins, Terraform, Kubernetes and Ansible.  Location - Central London. Competitive salary, exceptional bonus and benefits. Let me know if you want to learn more, or know of anyone that may want a step in the right direction.
